meanings.definition: To grant a license to use or do something under a license granted by a higher authority.
meanings.sent1: The company sublicenses its software to other businesses for a fee.
meanings.sent2: She sublicenses the artwork to different galleries around the world.
meanings.sent3: The cat sublicenses the right to nap in the sun to the dog for a bone.
meanings.sent4: His kindness sublicenses happiness to everyone he meets.
meanings.sent5: The teacher sublicenses knowledge to her students through engaging lessons.

meanings.definition: A license granted by a licensee to a third party.
meanings.sent1: The sublicenses allow other companies to use the patented technology.
meanings.sent2: He holds multiple sublicenses for various intellectual properties.
meanings.sent3: The party was a blast thanks to the magical sublicenses of fun and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a sublicenses of warmth on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The book was a sublicenses of adventure that took the reader on a thrilling journey.
